mapper.select: select MSG_ID, MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER, SEND_TIME, MSG, MSG_TYPE, MSG_PATH, IS_DELETE, IS_IMPORTANT, LEVELS from ZZ_GROUP_MSG where MSG_ID = #{msgId}
select MSG_ID, MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER, SEND_TIME, MSG, MSG_TYPE, MSG_PATH, IS_DELETE, IS_IMPORTANT, LEVELS from ZZ_GROUP_MSG
mapper.insert: insert into ZZ_GROUP_MSG(MSG_ID,MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER, SEND_TIME, MSG, MSG_TYPE, MSG_PATH, IS_DELETE, IS_IMPORTANT, LEVELS) values (#{msgId},#{msgSender}, #{msgReceiver}, sysdate, #{msg}, #{msgType}, #{msgPath}, #{isDelete}, #{isImportant}, #{levels})
mapper.update:
update ZZ_GROUP_MSG
MSG_SENDER = #{msgSender},
MSG_RECEIVER = #{msgReceiver},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime},
MSG = #{msg},
MSG_TYPE = #{msgType},
MSG_PATH = #{msgPath},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
IS_IMPORTANT = #{isImportant},
LEVELS = #{levels},
where MSG_ID = #{msgId}
mapper.select: select distinct b.user_id from zz_group_msg a, zz_user_group b where a.msg_receiver = b.group_id and a.msg_id = #{msgId} and b.user_id != a.msg_sender

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY FROMID,TYPE ORDER BY TIME DESC) RN ,t.* FROM ( SELECT PHPM.MSG_ID AS MSG_ID, 'USER' AS TABLE_TYPE, (case when PHPM.MSG_SENDER ='OPVhHrPM' then PHPM.MSG_RECEIVER else PHPM.MSG_SENDER end) as FROMID, --最近联系人 PHPM.MSG_RECEIVER AS TOID, PHPM.SEND_TIME AS TIME, PHPM.MSG AS CONTENT, PHPM.MSG_TYPE AS TYPE, PHPM.LEVELS AS SECRETlEVEL FROM ZZ_PRIVATE_MSG PHPM WHERE 1 = 1 and (PHPM.MSG_RECEIVER ='OPVhHrPM' or PHPM.MSG_SENDER = 'OPVhHrPM')
UNION ALL SELECT PHGM.MSG_ID AS MSG_ID, 'GROUP' AS TABLE_TYPE, PHGM.MSG_RECEIVER AS FROMID, PHGM.MSG_SENDER AS TOID, PHGM.SEND_TIME AS TIME, PHGM.MSG AS CONTENT, PHGM.MSG_TYPE AS type, PHGM.LEVELS AS SECRETlEVEL FROM ZZ_GROUP_MSG PHGM LEFT JOIN ZZ_USER_GROUP ZU ON PHGM.MSG_RECEIVER = ZU.GROUP_ID WHERE ZU.USER_ID ='OPVhHrPM' ) t ) ) VO where rn < =100 ORDER BY VO.time DESC
